segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen , welcome to tonight's fashion show .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We see you are all dressed to the nines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How very appropriate , because tonight we have a most dazzling show for you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this runway is going to sparkle with glamour and style !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some of tonight's highlights are dressed in the latest straight from Shanghai .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And others directly from New York .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , sit back and relax and get your order forms ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you're going to love this show !
segments.speaker: S2
